mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM covi_budget4j.bem_execute_regist a JOIN covi_budget4j.bem_regist r on a.CompanyCode = r.CompanyCode and a.FiscalYear = r.FiscalYear and a.AccountCode = r.AccountCode AND a.StandardBriefid = r.StandardBriefid AND a.ExecuteDate BETWEEN r.ValidFrom AND r.ValidTo AND a.BudgetCode = r.CostCenter JOIN covi_budget4j.vw_cost_center b ON a.CompanyCode = b.CompanyCode AND a.BudgetCode = b.CostCenterCode JOIN covi_account4j_si.act_account c ON a.CompanyCode = c.CompanyCode AND a.AccountCode = c.AccountCode WHERE a.companyCode = #{companyCode} AND a.FiscalYear = #{fiscalYear}
AND b.CostCenterType = #{costCenterType}
AND b.costCenterName LIKE CONCAT('%', #{costCenterName}, '%')
AND ( c.AccountCode LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchStr},'%') OR C.AccountName LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchStr},'%') OR C.AccountShortName LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchStr},'%') )
AND C.AccountCode LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchStr},'%')
AND C.AccountName LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchStr},'%')
AND C.AccountShortName LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchStr},'%')
AND a.BudgetCode IN ( SELECT u.CostCenterCode FROM covi_account4j_si.act_user_cost_center u WHERE u.CompanyCode = a.CompanyCode AND u.CostCenterCode = a.BudgetCode AND u.usercode = #{UR_Code} UNION SELECT #{UR_Code} FROM DUAL )
mapper.delete: DELETE BER FROM covi_budget4j.bem_execute_regist AS BER INNER JOIN covi_account4j_si.act_expence_application_list AS AEAL ON AEAL.ExpenceApplicationListID = BER.ExpenceApplicationListID WHERE AEAL.ExpenceApplicationID = #{ExpenceApplicationID}
